definition: abbr. for 青海[Qing1 hai3], Qinghai Province
youth corps/youth wing of a political party

pinyin: Gong4 chan3 zhu3 yi4 Qing1 nian2 tuan2

definition: young people in their late 20s or older who are still unmarried
Youth Day (May 4th), PRC national holiday for young people aged 14 to 28, who get half a day off
Communist Youth League of China/China Youth League
pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Gong4 chan3 zhu3 yi4 Qing1 nian2 tuan2

definition: YMCA (international Christian youth movement, formed in 1844)

sentences.english: During this period, a large number of youngers participated in the movement and went abroad.
sentences.chinese: 在這期間大批青年遠涉重洋，赴法留學。

sentences.english: Young heirs to future-hold, city grows more radiant.
sentences.chinese: 青年累代承未來，城市連年添華彩。

sentences.english: The young author burned energy as if he never heard of resting.
sentences.chinese: 這位青年作家耗費精力，似乎從未聽說過休息。

sentences.english: So, dear young people, please speak up for peace.
sentences.chinese: 所以，親愛的青年朋友，請爲和平仗義執言。

sentences.english: But in a culture that reveres age, some villagers refer to him dismissively as a "lad".
sentences.chinese: 在尊敬長者的文化中，一些村民對他輕蔑的稱爲青年。

sentences.english: India’s case was that of a 23-year-old who arrived in Hyderabad from New York.
sentences.chinese: 印度的患者是一名23歲從紐約到海德拉巴的青年人。

sentences.english: Us, as Subei youth, first of all should feel what?
sentences.chinese: 我們，作爲蘇北青年，首先應該感覺到的是什麼？

sentences.english: Yesterday, I participated in the 4th Youth Technology Festival awards evening of WISCO.
sentences.chinese: 昨天，我參加了武鋼第四屆青年科技節頒獎晚會。

sentences.english: Condusion Enlarges to the youth group's treatment dynamics, completes the prevention work.
sentences.chinese: 結論加大對青年組的治療力度，做好預防工作。

sentences.english: The forth episode of the coiled. riot, Eveline vividly demonstrates a kind of emotion paralysis in Dublin youngsters.
sentences.chinese: 生動地表現了都柏林青年人癱瘓的精神狀態。

sentences.english: Paused lifts the hand in the past's light youth to cancel the recollection.
sentences.chinese: 暫停中取消回憶過去的光青年舉起手。

sentences.english: The young worker found a lot of shortcomings in himself and he set about getting rid of it.
sentences.chinese: 那位青年工人發現身上有不少缺點，就着手進行改正。

sentences.english: As a youth, I choose to live a busy and meaningful life.
sentences.chinese: 作爲一個青年，我寧願過忙碌而有意義的生活。

sentences.english: After taps was blown the young campers had to turn out their lights and go to bed.
sentences.chinese: 吹過熄燈號後，那些青年露營者就得熄燈睡覺。

sentences.english: It is always good for young people to be put upon exerting themselves.
sentences.chinese: 讓青年人自己去闖闖總是有好處的。

sentences.english: Late adolescence is another transition, this time to leaving home altogether.
sentences.chinese: 青年期後期是另一個轉折，這時候完全地離開家。
